item.description:
Boston / Cambridge SEO Internet Marketing Networking Group

We invite local Boston SEO, affiliate marketers, search engine marketing to small business professionals in New England area to join us.

Location:

Robbins Library  
Mass Ave  
Arlington, MA

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

Food Sponsor

Brick Marketing

7:00 to 7:05

Assistant Organizer, @BrianHawkins will share his case study on breaking a world record for longest phone call that was featured on HubSpot.TV for being creative.

7:05pm to 7:30: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest  
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

7:30 to 7:45pm

Guest Speaker Demo:

Vitaly Bulgakov, senior software engineer, Ph.D. currently working in a software company.

Topic: Keywords recommendation tool

The demo of the tool can be accessed through this link http://KeywordsRetrieval.com .   The tool is based on the algorithms created as part of “Semantic Technologies for Web Solutions” research initiative. This tool in many cases outperforms Google keywords recommendation tool. It has practically unlimited capability to generate keywords semantically related to a topic of interest for both popular and niche businesses. The algorithm does not require a repository of keywords. Keywords are generated dynamically using a targeted web crawling.

7:45 - 8:15 Open Internet Marketing Round Table Discussion

Experts will share specific advice in an open discussion. No formal speaker, it will be casual group discussion like when we first started this SEO meetup in a local coffee shop five years ago.

8:15 to 8:45 Open Challenge Questions

Time to get advice to help fellow internet marketers.

8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!

----------------------------------  
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: 1st 2012 Boston SEO Meetup
